original_title: オフィスレディの湿ったパンスト 香椎花乃
overview: Suzu, an office worker who joined the company three months ago, was bewildered by the unfamiliar work, but she was living a fulfilling life with the support of her kind seniors. One day, by chance, Suzu discovers that an indecent voyeur video of herself has been saved on Manager Sugiura's PC...
title: Damp Pantyhose Office Lady – Hanano Kashii
